sqlQueries.SqlQuery: SELECT  [structure_code] as primaryKey, [structure_name], [structure_code], [description], [last_updated_on], '[ip].[structure]' as tableName FROM [ip].[structure]
SELECT  [planning_code] as primaryKey, [planning_Code], [short_name], [ppl_code] , [code22], '[ip].[planning_entity]' as tableName FROM [ip].[planning_entity]
SELECT  dsc_code+anc_code as primaryKey, [dsc_code], [anc_code], [anc_depth], '[ip].[structure_tree]' as tableName FROM [ip].[structure_tree]
